div.style: z-index: 7; min-width: 541px; max-width: 541px; max-width: 123px; max-width: 123px; white-space: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 100;font-family:Arial;border-color:rgba(167, 151, 111, 1.00);

img.div: Open enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year has begun! Click on the button below to enter your information for the February 1st lottery. Join us for Odyssey’s open house on January 23rd from 6:00 to 7:30 pm. There will be staff available to answer questions as well as tours of the school!

div.style: z-index: 7; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 100;font-family:Arial;border-color:rgba(167, 151, 111, 1.00);

img.div: Your educational journey begins at Odyssey Charter School. Serving students from kindergarten through 6th grade. Our tuition free public charter school offers a classically based curriculum that is both challenging and engaging. Our highly trained and qualified staff ignite student's passion for knowledge.

div.style: z-index: 7; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 100;font-family:Arial;border-color:rgba(167, 151, 111, 1.00);

img.div:
Odyssey Charter School teaches students how to learn using a classically based
curriculum that is thorough, challenging and systematic. Taught to appreciate public
virtue, supplied with knowledge and enabled to discover the patterns and relationships
therein, each student is prepared to embark on their individual odyssey with the
foundation of knowledge and critical thinking skills necessary to enjoy being
independent learners for life.

div.style: z-index: 5; min-width: 893px; max-width: 893px; max-width: 420px; max-width: 420px; white-space: normal; font-size: 25px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 100;font-family:Arial;border-color:rgba(167, 151, 111, 1.00);

img.div: Due to the early dismissal of school this year the front office no longer has regular hours and therefore, is unable to take phone calls. If you have any questions or concerns please email the front office at office@odysseycharter.net and they will respond as quickly as possible. Thank you!

Voted Best Charter
School In Utah County

div.style: z-index: 7; min-width: 421px; max-width: 421px; max-width: 83px; max-width: 83px; white-space: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 100;font-family:Arial;border-color:rgba(167, 151, 111, 1.00);

img.div:
Voted "Best of Utah Valley" 6 years in a row! Come take a tour
to find out why our students and families love it here.
Tours are every Tuesday and Thursday between 9-11.

div.style: z-index: 7; min-width: 381px; max-width: 381px; white-space: normal; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: 400; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1.00);

img.div:
Fall In Love With Learning As You Dream, Explore,
Become Engaged And Energized. Prepare For Your
Future With Our Wonderful Community of Excellent
Teachers, Mentors And Friends. Your Education Is In
Good Hands At Odyssey!

div.p: Arts is essential to the effective education of a child. Through exposure to fine arts, children grow in their knowledge creatively, historically, and analytically. Odyssey boasts a rich music program with a foundation in the European based Kodaly method, including an after school choir program.

As a traditional element to a classical education, Odyssey offers Latin instruction from fourth to sixth grade. Latin is a root for sixty percent of English words. Learning Latin provides a broader basis for the English language, scientific terms, and learning romance languages such as Spanish, French and Italian.

Many ongoing extra curricular programs are offered, from fencing, robotics, chess club, art training, tutoring, choir, golf, volleyball, Bricks 4 Kids, Mad Science, drama and others. Students are bound to find a special interest with our offerings.

div.h4: ROOTED IN CLASSICS, FINE ARTS AND SERVICE

div.p: Odyssey Charter School opened its doors in September 2005 as a K through 6 charter school. We are a tuition-free public school; OCS welcomes all eligible applicants up to its enrollment limit and, afterwards, admits students randomly (by lottery). Click here to read Odyssey's charter and our state report card.

Odyssey Charter School teaches students how to learn using a classically based curriculum that is thorough, challenging and systematic. Taught to appreciate public virtue, supplied with knowledge and enabled to discover the patterns and relationships therein, each student is prepared to embark on their individual odyssey with the foundation of knowledge and critical thinking skills necessary to enjoy being independent learners for life.

Odyssey Charter School
738 East Quality Drive (700 South)
American Fork, Utah 84003
office@odysseycharter.net
